Care Connect Report Code SnCT

A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a diagnotic report

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = (<<371525003 | Clinical procedure report (record artifact))

name: Care Connect Report Code SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a diagnotic report
